data.content:
Anh - Anh
flatfish
■ noun (plural same or flatfishes) a flounder, plaice, dab, sole, or other marine fish that swims on its side with both eyes on the upper side of its flattened body. [Order Pleuronectiformes.]

sentences.en: Halibut is a flatfish of the genus Hippoglossus.
sentences.vi: Cá thờn bơn là một loài cá thân bẹt thuộc giống Hippoglossus.

sentences.en: The flatfish is remarkably adept at hiding itself on the sea bed.
sentences.vi: Cá bơn đặc biệt giỏi giấu mình dưới đáy biển.
